ing: 1 (8 ounce) can water chestnuts, drained and halved
2 pounds cooked and chopped chicken breast
des: "A community favorite and a beloved luncheon dish; the secret is Major Grey's chutney!"
ins: Toss the water chestnuts with the lemon juice in a large bowl. Add the chicken, celery, grapes, and almonds to the water chestnuts. Stir the mayonnaise, chutney, curry powder, and salt together in a separate bowl. Fold the chicken mixture into the mayonnaise mixture; stir to coat evenly. Chill in refrigerator at least 30 minutes before serving.
